Post.title: Construct Your Blog with Hexo and Github
Post._content:
# 

https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000017986794

https://godweiyang.com/2018/04/13/hexo-blog/

https://blog.guaoxiaohei.com/posts/Hexo-Level/

# 

<!-- more -->

## hexo d GitHub

_config.yml



url: github,  https://xyegithub.github.io/myBlog/

root: url/myBlog/

hexo clean; hexo g; hexo d

##  git



https://juejin.cn/post/6844904193170341896

dnscmd ipconfig /flushdns



### 

hexo _config.ymlgit`https://github.com/xxx`ssh `git@github.com:xxx/xxx`

## github page 



https://mizeri.github.io/2021/04/18/hexo-sitemap-google/

## (Policy Network)

[Policy_Network.py](https://github.com/xyegithub/myBlog/blob/main/2021/12/03/First-Step-to-RL/policy_network.py)



 ```python
 score = tf.matmul(layer1,W2)
 probability = tf.nn.sigmoid(score)#Action 1
 input_y = tf.placeholder(tf.float32,[None,1], \\
                          name="input_y")# 
 advantages = tf.placeholder(tf.float32,name="reward_signal") 
 # 
 loglik = tf.log(input_y*(input_y - probability) + \\
                 (1 - input_y)*(input_y + probability)) 
 # 1
 
 # 00
 #
 loss = -tf.reduce_mean(loglik * advantages) # 
 #advantages
 #advantages 
 #
 
 #

 #0.501

 ```

---



0.5Action

### 



```python
#xAction 1
tfprob = sess.run(probability,feed_dict={observations: x})
# 
action = 1 if np.random.uniform() < tfprob else 0
```



```python
# 
# tfprob = sess.run(probability,feed_dict={observations: x})
# 0.5
tfprob = 0.5
action = 1 if np.random.uniform() < tfprob else 0
```





 actionactionaction





## (Value NetworkQ-learning)

Q-Learing

[Value_Network.py](https://github.com/xyegithub/myBlog/blob/main/2021/12/03/First-Step-to-RL/policy_network.py)

Actionreward



```python
#Save the experience to our episode buffer.
episodeBuffer.add(np.reshape(np.array([s,a,r,s1,d]),[1,5]))
# saActionrActionreward
# s1Actiond  
```

1. Q(s<sub>t</sub>, a<sub>t</sub>)areward

2. Q<sub>desird</sub>rewardQ<sub>desired</sub>(s<sub>t</sub>, a<sub>t</sub>) = r + $\lambda$ Max<sub>a</sub> Q<sub>desired</sub>(s<sub>t+1</sub>, a)

3.   Q<sub>desired</sub>

   



```python
#Choose an action by greedily (with e chance of random action)
# from the Q-network
if np.random.rand(1) < e or total_steps < pre_train_steps:
    a = np.random.randint(0,4)
else:
    a = sess.run(mainQN.predict,feed_dict={mainQN.scalarInput:[s]})[0]
# total_steps < pre_train_steps
# total_steps >= pre_train_steps
# e1-eAction 
# 
# epre_train_steps
# Action
# 
# Action
# 
```

**"by greedily (with e chance of random action) from the Q-network"**

**<font color=green></font>**



```python
if total_steps > pre_train_steps:
    if e > endE:
        e -= stepDrop
# 
# 
# 
# pass
# endE=0.1 
#
```





```python 
if total_steps % (update_freq) == 0:
    trainBatch = myBuffer.sample(batch_size) #Get a random batch of experiences.
    #Below we perform the Double-DQN update to the target Q-values
    # ActiontrainBatch[:,3]
    # Q(st, at) = r + $\lambda$ Max Q(s_t+1, a)
    # Actiont+1Action
    Q1 = sess.run(mainQN.predict,feed_dict={mainQN.scalarInput:np.vstack(trainBatch[:,3])})
    # targetreward
    Q2 = sess.run(targetQN.Qout,feed_dict={targetQN.scalarInput:np.vstack(trainBatch[:,3])})
    end_multiplier = -(trainBatch[:,4] - 1)
    # Actiontargetreward
    # reward, Max Q(s_t+1, a)
    doubleQ = Q2[range(batch_size),Q1]
    # Q(st, at) = r + $\lambda$ Max Q(s_t+1, a)
    # rewardreward
    targetQ = trainBatch[:,2] + (y*doubleQ * end_multiplier)
    #Update the network with our target values.
    # 
    # 
    _ = sess.run(mainQN.updateModel, \
                 feed_dict={mainQN.scalarInput:np.vstack(trainBatch[:,0]),mainQN.targetQ:targetQ, mainQN.actions:trainBatch[:,1]})
    # target
    updateTarget(targetOps,sess) #Update the target network toward the primary network.
```



target

```python 
def updateTargetGraph(tfVars,tau):
    total_vars = len(tfVars)
    op_holder = [] 
    # target
    for idx,var in enumerate(tfVars[0:total_vars//2]):
        # idx+total_varstarget
        # target =  * tau + 1- tau*target
        # target
        # target
        # target
        # targetActionrewardAction
        # target
        # target
        # 
        op_holder.append(tfVars[idx+total_vars//2].assign\\
                         ((var.value()*tau) \\
                      + ((1-tau)*tfVars[idx+total_vars//2].value())))
        return op_holder

    def updateTarget(op_holder,sess):
        for op in op_holder:
            sess.run(op)

```

state of the arttrick

1. CNN
2. Experience replayNN batchsizeN=1
3. target**targetQ-Learing********DQNQQ**targettargettargetQ
4. Double DQNtricktargetActionactiontargetreward
5. Dueling DQN

```python 
self.AW = tf.Variable(xavier_init([h_size//2,env.actions]))
self.VW = tf.Variable(xavier_init([h_size//2,1]))
self.Advantage = tf.matmul(self.streamA,self.AW)
self.Value = tf.matmul(self.streamV,self.VW)

#Then combine them together to get our final Q-values.
# QoutActionrewardValueAdvantage
# Valueadvantage#action
# Dueling DQNrewardValue
# ActionAction
# 
#out
# Action
# 
self.Qout = self.Value + tf.subtract(self.Advantage,tf.reduce_mean(self.Advantage,axis=1,keep_dims=True))
```



# 





sgd









reward 

Q<sub>desired</sub>(s<sub>t</sub>, a<sub>t</sub>) = r + $\lambda$ Max<sub>a</sub> Q<sub>desired</sub>(s<sub>t+1</sub>, a)





```python 
if done:
    episode_number += 1
    epx = np.vstack(xs)
    epy = np.vstack(ys)
    epr = np.vstack(drs)
    tfp = tfps
    xs,hs,dlogps,drs,ys,tfps = [],[],[],[],[],[]

    discounted_epr = discount_rewards(epr)
    discounted_epr -= np.mean(discounted_epr)
    discounted_epr //= np.std(discounted_epr)

    tGrad = sess.run(newGrads,feed_dict={observations: epx, input_y: epy, advantages: discounted_epr})
    for ix,grad in enumerate(tGrad):
        gradBuffer[ix] += grad

        if episode_number % batch_size == 0:
            sess.run(updateGrads,feed_dict={W1Grad: gradBuffer[0],W1_1Grad:gradBuffer[1],W2Grad:gradBuffer[2]})
```
